name: Pig Out!
description:
Pig Out is a faithful computerised reproduction of the classic tabletop game 'Pass the Pigs'. Up to 8 players - human, or computer controlled - can take part in an exciting, often frantic race to 100 points by scoring points based on how unlikely a position they end up in. You'll be playing 'till pigs fly!

Music by Chris 'CosmoMoose' Medway: http://www.cosmomoose.com/ and 'mrfunkyland': http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/508725

Pig graphics by Vinny Middlemost

To play, download the zip file above, then unzip it and run 'Pig_Out_Graphical_Edition.exe'.

Runs on Windows and possibly on Linux. Mac is not currently supported.
